translation.MaxNameError: Name must contain at most 50 characters
translation.MinNameError: Name must contain at least 2 characters

translation.Reactjs: React has been a fundamental part of my journey as a programmer, extensively used in various projects. With this library, I crafted interactive and reactive user interfaces, delivering an efficient and user-friendly experience. The modularity of React components allowed for code reusability and ensured consistency throughout the codebase.
translation.Tailwind: In this current project, I opted for Tailwind CSS to streamline interface styling. Tailwind's utility-first approach expedited the development process, enabling me to create custom styles quickly through the combination of utility classes. The built-in responsiveness simplified the creation of layouts that seamlessly adapt to different devices and screen sizes.
translation.Nextjs: Applied in several previous projects, both in pre-13 and post-13 versions, the adoption of Next.js yielded significant benefits. Server-Side Rendering (SSR) enhanced application performance, as pages were pre-rendered, resulting in faster loading times and a better user experience. Additionally, Next.js's straightforward routing system accelerated project development and maintenance.
translation.Typescript: Incorporating TypeScript into my projects brought gains in security and readability. Static typing helped prevent common errors during development, making the code more reliable and easier to maintain. With the ability to define types for variables, function parameters, and returns, I gained clear insights into data structures, facilitating team collaboration.
translation.Nodejs: Node.js was crucial for developing robust and scalable APIs. Leveraging Node.js, I created highly performant and asynchronous servers, ensuring applications responded promptly to user requests. The ability to work with JavaScript both on the frontend and backend simplified communication and synchronization between different layers of the application.
translation.AWS: AWS has been extensively used in various projects for hosting and managing cloud infrastructure. With AWS, I implemented the creation of EC2 instances to ensure high availability and scalability. Additionally, I utilized S3 to store resources, such as images, in an economical and reliable manner. Through Elastic Beanstalk, I automated the deployment and updating of applications based on metrics. Integration with CodeCommit allowed for efficient code repository management.
translation.Jest: An integral part of my development practices, Jest was the primary choice for implementing unit tests in my projects. With Jest, I created automated tests that ensured code quality and application stability.
translation.GraphQL: The utilization of GraphQL with Apollo Client brought significant advantages to the applications. Through GraphQL, I consumed customized endpoints, obtaining only the required data for each component, avoiding unnecessary data fetching, and vastly improving performance. This approach proved especially relevant in projects with multiple data sources.
translation.OliFirstResponsabilities: Webapp Development/ Management/ Deploy (React / Next / Typescript / GraphQL / AWS server)
translation.OliSecondResponsabilities: SDK Development/ Management/ Deploy (React / Websockets / AWS server)
translation.MoodarFirstResponsabilities: App and Webapp Development/ Management/ Deploy (React js/React Native)
translation.MoodarSecondResponsabilities: Server Development/ Management/ Deploy (Python with Django web framework) and AWS Elastic Beanstalk
